quick_gallium.task: Assess 2026 supply risk and mitigation options for gallium in U.S. clean energy manufacturing.
quick_gallium.rag_context: Focus on U.S. exposure, 2024-2026 policy signals, and substitution options.
quick_gallium.execution_instruction: Produce a source-grounded decision brief with assumptions, uncertainty notes, and actionable mitigation steps.

graphite_battery.task: Evaluate natural vs synthetic graphite supply risks for North American EV battery anode production through 2027.
graphite_battery.rag_context: Prioritize domestic processing bottlenecks, allied sourcing options, and tariff-related constraints.
graphite_battery.execution_instruction: Return a concise executive memo plus technical appendix-style bullets for procurement planning.

multi_mineral_stress.task: Stress-test rare-earth and cobalt supply posture under simultaneous policy and logistics shocks for U.S. defense manufacturing.
multi_mineral_stress.rag_context: Emphasize 2024-2026 disruptions, substitution constraints, and resilience investment priorities.
multi_mineral_stress.execution_instruction: Provide a red-team style risk narrative and rank-order mitigations by expected impact and implementation complexity.
